Hopefully Ares survived, my Lunarpines got a score to settle with him.

this post also involves 10154, and10156

Lunarpine hears the explosion outside, "Wing open my chamber" he 
requested wanting to know what the commotion was. It was to late, she 
already reacted to the blast, he pounded on the door of the chamber, 
trying to beat and claw his way out.

"Sensing a rise in activity, compensating." the cr chamber released a 
chemical into the chamber to sedate the struggling bot.

"No, I can't sleep through a battle" but it was no use, the chemical 
had already taken effect and Lunarpine was slipping offline.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Jason, there are no Newcomers at the Ark. They're all dead except 
for Unitron 
> and possibly Ares.
